I noticed that there are more people of color on the WNBA and the NBA.

I wonder why most managers are not people of color and why the MLB has less people of color as players.

This affects my community because it can inspire or encourage more kids to play sports, they can look up to these people.

"White people still want control?: Graph about players of color."
